doc.str: Method for assaying flowing media for microbial toxins
Testing of flowing media for microbial toxins via whole blood incubation in a flow vessel containing a separation element and assaying for mediators.

Altex, Jan. 18, 2001, reference of record, sited by Applicant. cited by examiner . | Case, G.D., et al., "Interactions of Blood Metalloproteins with Nitrogen Oxides and Oxidant Air Pollutants", Environmental Research v. 20, pp. 43-65, (1979). cited by other. | Lonneman, Gerhard, Nephrol.
